name: df-nrg
body: |- wceq(cnrg, crab(s0, cngp, wcel(cfv(cnm, cv(s0)), cfv(cabv, cv(s0)))))
comment: A normed ring is a ring with an induced topology and metric such that the metric is translation-invariant and the norm (distance from 0) is an absolute value on the ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
